description: three seated figures and one standing figure, all looking toward left; frontmost figure seated on a bench
markings: LRC, stamped in black: [S (illegible) / I R] (Lugt 2364) and another illegible stamp
medium: Pen and brown ink with brown wash on paper laid down on board
provenance: Sir Joshua Reynolds (1723-1792), Lugt 2364, London. John and Alice Steiner, Larchmont, New York (1972-87; given, as by Francesco Allegrini or his circle, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1987-d. 2010; bequeathed to Mia)
title: Study for the Calling of Saint Matthew
